name: Heretic's Arena
description:
Sort of a Doom like endless arena shooter made for Miz Jam 1. Try to get a good high score!

Controls are: WASD to move, space to jump, E to interact, mouse to look and shoot, scroll wheel or 1-5 to switch weapons, Q to switch to previous weapon, F to throw grenade, and escape to open the exit menu.

Took around 45 hours to make in Godot. It's not the best game around, but it is my first released game! 

"You are a Historian with a taste for the unknown. Your research has brought you to the ruins of the ancient and mysterious city of Guntopia, whose people were said to be gifted with the power they called "Guns" before they vanished. However, because of your research you have been declared to be a heretic! An unending horde of bounty hunters and crusaders have come to take your head, but with your newfound powers you may be able to keep them at bay, for now..."

If you have any issues or find any bugs please let me know!
